abstract: A historian has unearthed a 1902 newspaper article about “Face Book The New Fad” that shares some characteristics with the modern Facebook social networking service.
snippet: A historian has unearthed a 1902 newspaper article about “Face Book The New Fad” that shares some characteristics with the modern Facebook social networking service.
lead_paragraph: Remember that dispute about whether it was Mark Zuckerberg or some other Harvard students who really dreamed up Facebook a few years ago?

headline.main: The ‘Face Book Fad’ Is More Than a Century Old
